Title: The Path to Respect Lies in Violence
Description:
You have proven yourself in battle.

Still, if you would aid us further, I must ask something else of you.

The Sha of Violence awaits beyond within the Sealed Chambers. Destroy it if you would earn my respect.
PortraitGiverText: Master Snowdrift has asked you to slay this vile creature.
RewardText:
You have defeated the Sha of Violence and saved the monastery. You have my respect.

Perhaps we were wrong about your people, $n.
